name: Lab of Secrets
description:
Lab of Secrets

This is a Ren'Py based visual novel/game with adult themes. 

You have to uncover the secret behind your father's mysterious fatal car crash. In the lab you found as a child, a locked door has been haunting you ever since. Perhaps now, that you are older and more expirenced, you will be able to solve this mystery. And also have some fun, if you catch my meaning, along the way.
